course.title: MAT 5131 Ordinary Differential Equations I (3 units)
course.desc: One or two specialized Linear systems, fundamental solution. Nonlinear systems, existence and uniqueness, flow. Equilibria, periodic solutions, stability.Invariant manifolds and hyperbolic theory. topics taken from, but not limited to: perturbation and asymptotic methods, normal forms and bifurcations, global dynamics.This course is equivalent to MATH 5405 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
